Discover new adventures, celebrate with friends and family, or indulge in a relaxing getaway at this iconic resort, nestled between the Atlantic Ocean and Intracoastal Waterway. Enjoy beachfront entertainment, spacious accommodations, and unparalleled coastal luxury. Our 369 guest rooms offer waterfront views that invite you to unwind from the everyday and simply chill. Exclusive Offers Previous Slide 10th Year Anniver... BOOK NOW Learn More Keep the Party Going BOOK NOW Learn More Florida & Georgia... BOOK NOW Learn More Family Paradise E... BOOK NOW Learn More Pre & Post Cruise... BOOK NOW Learn More AAA Member Offer BOOK NOW Learn More First Responders,... BOOK NOW Learn More Pay Now, Save More BOOK NOW Learn More Next Slide JWB Prime Steak and Seafood JWB​ offers a fresh take on fine dining with fresh seafood, a premium raw bar, and prime cuts of meat, all paired with world-class wines and hand-crafted cocktails. Learn more about JWB Prime Steak and Seafood Learn More LandShark​ Bar & Grill Inspired by beach bars along the Atlantic Coast, LandShark Bar & Grill offers delicious seafood, drinks, and fun with ocean views. It’s the ideal spot for a casual meal and relaxation at Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort. Learn more about LandShark​ Bar & Grill Learn More Margaritaville​ Restaurant Raise a glass and indulge in Florida flavors at Margaritaville Restaurant. Enjoy signature Margaritaville dishes, live music, and a wide selection of tropical cocktails. Whether you’re craving fresh seafood or classic island fare, our restaurant offers something for every guest. Learn more about Margaritaville​ Restaurant Learn More 5 o'Clock Somewhere​ Bar & Grill At 5 o'Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill, experience the perfect blend of tasty bar bites and refreshing tropical drinks. Located dockside, this rustic bar offers live entertainment and is the ideal spot to unwind and relax by the beach. Learn more about 5 o'Clock Somewhere​ Bar & Grill Learn More Lone Palm Beach Bar​ For a tropical drink and casual vibe, head to Lone Palm Beach Bar. Located near the pool or by the Hollywood Beach Broadwalk, this tiki bar serves refreshing cocktails, making it a perfect choice for guests who want to chill by the water. Learn more about Lone Palm Beach Bar​ Learn More Floridays Sip margaritas at Floridays, a laid-back beachside cantina serving refreshing drinks and signature cocktails, perfect for enjoying the Florida sunshine. Learn more about Floridays Learn More Margaritaville Coffee Shop Start your day with a cup of Margaritaville’s signature gourmet coffee at our on-site coffee shop, serving light bites and pastries in a cozy beachside setting. Learn more about Margaritaville Coffee Shop Learn More Drinks & Dining JWB Prime Steak and Seafood LandShark​ Bar & Grill Margaritaville​ Restaurant 5 o'Clock Somewhere​ Bar & Grill Lone Palm Beach Bar​ Floridays Margaritaville Coffee Shop Activities Experience Packages FlowRider St. Somewhere Spa Pool Paradise Couples & Family Photos Kayak & Paddleboarding Jet Ski Rentals Fitness Center & Classes Area Activities Learn More Accommodations Guest Rooms The resort’s rooms and suites combine the classic carefree vibe of the Florida coast with the modern comforts of a luxury hotel. Gaze out across the sparkling Atlantic Ocean or the calming Intracoastal Waterway from your private balcony and relax amid island-inspired decor, upscale tropical furnishings, and signature Margaritaville amenities. Explore the range of accommodations and find the space that suits your stay. Learn More Meetings, Weddings & Special Events Previous Slide Meetings Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is not just a place for relaxation—it’s also an excellent venue for business meetings. Our meeting space offers over 15,000 square feet of flexible space, with options for both indoor and outdoor meetings. After the meeting, unwind at one of our iconic bars or take a stroll along the Hollywood Beach Broadwalk. Groups & Social Events Whether it’s a corporate retreat, a team-building event, or a family gathering, Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort offers ideal venues for your next group event. Our resort is perfect for social gatherings such as receptions, parties, or any event that needs a Florida beachfront venue with a twist of tropical fun. Weddings Is there anything more magical than a beachfront wedding? Celebrate your special day at the most romantic resort in Hollywood, Florida—Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort. From intimate beachfront ceremonies to grand ballroom receptions, our team will ensure your wedding day is as magical as the setting. Next Slide What's Nearby Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is located just minutes from top attractions, shopping, and entertainment in Hollywood, FL. Discover the nearby attractions, including: Zoom In Zoom Out All Points Air & Sea Ports Attractions Convention Centers Shopping Stadiums Stay Connected With Margaritaville There’s always something going on at Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort, from exciting events to exclusive deals. Sign up for our newsletter, and you’ll be among the first to know our latest offers and updates. Join the Margaritaville team—the most exciting and fastest-growing brand in the hospitality industry Apply Now for Resort Positions Apply Now For SPA Positions Team Member Benefits: Excellent Health Insurance including: Medical Dental Vision Disability and Life Insurance 401K Retirement Plan Paid Vacation Paid Sick Time Discounts on Margaritaville Brand and Davidson Hotels Monthly Celebrations And more… Join the Margaritaville team—the most exciting and fastest-growing brand in the hospitality industry! Davidson Hospitality Group endeavors to make www.davidsonhospitality.com accessible to all users. If you would like to contact us regarding the accessibility of our website or need assistance completing the application process due to a physical or mental disability, please call the hotel where you are applying and request to speak with Human Resources. You may also send an email to [email protected] and include your full name, contact number, physical accommodation needed, and hotel name and city in which you are attempting to apply. Davidson Hospitality Group is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace and affirmative action employer. All persons shall have the opportunity to be considered for employment without regard to their race, color, creed, religion, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, age, sex, or gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, and related medical conditions), gender identity or expression (including transgender status), sexual orientation, marital status, military and veteran status, physical or mental disability, protected medical condition as defined by applicable state or local law, genetic information or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state or local laws and ordinances. Start Planning CLICK TO CALL VIEW WEDDING VIDEOS 360 Tour Wedding Venues Indoor, outdoor, intimate, or expansive — the resort’s flexible waterfront wedding venues can perfectly accommodate your event. Explore the inspiring oceanside spaces and find the perfect setting for your celebration. Wedding Venues Wedding Venues Catering Services Paradise is made even more beautiful when the service and quality exceeds your expectations. Catering Menus are just that- catering to your specific needs, likes and wants. Customized menus and packages are easily designed to accommodate your style and theme. Allow our team of culinary experts and event professionals to create the special event of your dreams. Our meeting space offers over 15,000 square feet of flexible space, with options for both indoor and outdoor meetings. After the meeting, unwind at one of our iconic bars or take a stroll along the Hollywood Beach Broadwalk. From intimate beachfront ceremonies to grand ballroom receptions, our team will ensure your wedding day is as magical as the setting. 5 O'CLOCK SOMEWHERE BAR & GRILL, Hollywood - 2025 Reviews Skip to main content Discover Trips Review CAD Sign in Hollywood Hotels Things to Do Restaurants Flights Cruises Vacation Rentals Forums United States Florida (FL) Broward County Hollywood Hollywood Restaurants 5 O'Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill 5 O'Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill Claimed Someone from this business manages this listing. Learn More Share Review Save 4.0 4 of 5 bubbles ( 394 reviews ) #1 of 8 Bars & Pubs in Hollywood American , Bar , $$ - $$$ 155 What is Travellers’ Choice? Tripadvisor gives a Travellers’ Choice award to accommodations, attractions and restaurants that consistently earn great reviews from travellers and are ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Interior 13 Food 22 Menu 5 5 O'Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill Share Review Save At a glance Closed today See all hours 1112 N Ocean Dr, Hollywood, FL 33019 Website Menu +1 954-874-4444 Email Improve this listing About It’s always 5 o’Clock here. This rustic indoor-outdoor dockside bar located on the Intracoastal Waterway, serves up bar bites, drinks and live entertainment every Wednesday – Sunday (Weekly entertainment calendar listed on Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort site). Breathtaking sunsets are just an added bonus. A waterfront beach, with a cozy fire pit, adirondak chairs spread throughout, and host daily sunset rituals. The 5 o’Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill also features a Water Taxi stop and serves as the launch pad for paddle boarding and kayak rentals and excursions. Join us for our weekly specials! Wednesdays, Peel & Eat Shrimp Special. Fridays, Cauldron Clam Bake featuring Maine Lobster & Crabs OR King Crab & Mussels. Pets are unfortunately not permitted at this location. Read more Read less Features CUISINES American, Bar, Grill Meal types Lunch, Dinner, Drinks Special Diets Vegetarian friendly FEATURES Accepts Credit Cards Full Bar Highchairs Available Live Music Outdoor Seating Parking Available Seating Serves Alcohol Table Service Takeout Television Waterfront Wheelchair Accessible Wine and Beer Location 1112 N Ocean Dr, Hollywood, FL 33019 Parking Available Can a gluten free person get a good meal at this restaurant? Yes No Unsure Top 3 reasons to eat here Sponsored by: 5 O'Clock Somewhere Bar & Grill " Great atmosphere. You can watch the boats and dolphins pass by " James E See reviews that mention great atmosphere " This is a fun place to visit. The coastal-luxe ambiance permeates throughout the spacious 15,000 square feet of interior meeting space along the 9th floor. This is where collaboration, motivation, and productivity thrive. The inspired enclave is insulated from distractions, providing an elevated focus to the business at hand. Robust attendance, a thirst for knowledge, clarity of mind, and attention to detail are part of the ROI with your successful meeting. When the serious business of the day is done, it’s time for some serious fun. Your license to chill awaits! Start Planning CLICK TO CALL 3-d Tour Corporate Events Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, the resort’s indoor and outdoor event spaces set the stage for collaboration, motivation, and productivity. The venues and services here are perfect for board meetings and corporate events, ensuring all the peace and productivity you need. LEARN MORE Special Events Private dinners, cocktail parties, group getaways, and more — this beachfront paradise is the perfect place to host your special event LEARN MORE Catering Whether you’re fueling your business meeting or hosting a lavish banquet, the resort’s customizable menus and packages can accommodate any scope and style you have in mind. LEARN MORE Team Building Explore fun activities, friendly competitions, and guided programs designed to build communication and help your team members work together more effectively. LEARN MORE Awards & Accolades Margaritaville Hollywood Beach Resort is proud to be recognized by the following prestigious publications and organizations for outstanding service and leadership. LEARN MORE Venue Floor Plans Indoor, outdoor, intimate, or expansive — the resort’s flexible venues can perfectly accommodate whatever you have in mind for your event. Explore the spaces and find the perfect setting for your gathering.
